games.title: TB World
games.description:
Discover the fascinating world of the game Toka Life, which will give you a sea of creativity and joy! Here you can bring your fantasies to life, creating stylish images for characters and cozy interiors.

The design process will be a real pleasure: choose from a variety of clothes, accessories and interior items to make each image and space unique. Transform your characters and their surroundings to create a unique atmosphere.

This game is your personal creativity workshop where you create your own story. Start your exciting journey into the world of design today and let your ideas flow, creating unique images and cozy interiors!
games.howToPlayText:
The game opens up endless possibilities for creativity and fun, with your main task being to bring your fantasies to life and create unique stories.

The controls are intuitive and user-friendly, making it perfect for players of all ages. The simple interface allows you to easily move characters, items, and decor by swiping across the screen. You can tap on clothing and accessories to dress up your characters and drag items to decorate interiors.

In TB World, there are no strict rules or fixed storylines. You become the author of your own adventures and stories, using a wide range of scenarios, characters, and items. Your imagination is the only limit in this world of creativity and possibilities!

games.title: Fashion Princess - Dress Up for Girls
games.description: Enter the enchanting world of Fashion Princess, a free 3D dress-up game for girls. Create stunning looks with stylish outfits and accessories while competing in exciting fashion challenges. Collect crystals to unlock new styles and dances on your phone or computer, and become the ultimate fashion icon.
games.howToPlayText:
Dive into the world of fashion with a new free 3D game for girls! Dress your princess in the best outfits, dresses, accessories and shoes. Win fashion races!

👗 Choose the right clothes and hairstyles to earn the highest scores from the judges. Your taste and creativity will lead to success!
💎 Collect crystals to unlock new models and dances. Unlock more options to create amazing looks!
👑Create your unique avatar and become a fashion queen! We wish you good luck in this fashion race!

games.description: Discover **My Town Home: Family Playhouse**, a vibrant online dollhouse adventure that sparks your imagination. Explore six unique rooms, create family narratives, and enjoy activities like cooking and gardening. Play for **free** on your phone or computer and craft your ideal virtual family experience.
games.howToPlayText:
The navigation in this game is very simple.
On desktop: use the mouse click.
On mobile: use your finger tap.

games.title: Animal Hair Salon
games.description: Enter the enchanting realm of Animal Hair Salon, where you unleash your creativity as a stylist for adorable animals. Enjoy this free online game and utilize various tools to design, cut, and color unique hairstyles while adding charming accessories. Get ready to work your magic!
games.howToPlayText: Choose the animal you want to do your hair for. Click on the tool at the bottom of the screen, and then on the hair to interact with them. Create a dream hairstyle and then choose accessories.

games.title: Sprunki
games.description: Enter the mesmerizing world of Sprunki, where music comes alive! This engaging online game lets you create melodies using charming Sprunki characters. Enjoy limitless sound combinations for a truly free musical adventure, accessible on both smartphones and computers.
games.howToPlayText:
Sprunki – Create your own melody using a combination of different sounds!

Dive into the world of Sprunki, where music comes to life right before your eyes and creative freedom knows no bounds. Create your own melodies with the charismatic Sprunki characters!

Game Features:
🎼 Unlimited musical possibilities: Discover hundreds of sound combinations that are perfect for you.

🧩 Complete creative freedom: Play your way—no restrictions, just mix and experiment.

🌟 Find the best combinations: Choose the ideal rhythms and melodies to craft your unique musical style.

🎧 Engaging and relaxing: Perfect for laid-back gameplay and inspiring musical experimentation.

In Sprunki Game, everything is simple and fun: drag characters, mix rhythms, and create tracks with no limits. You are the composer, and each sound combination is your own unique musical masterpiece.

If you don't have sound on your iPhone, enable notifications with the special button on your phone❗️

🎵 Choose a sound: Each character has their own unique sound. Simply drag a character from the bottom onto any Sprunki to add their sound to your mix.

🎶 Combine Sprunkis to create a harmonious and captivating melody. Experiment and enjoy the process!

✨ Find the secret scene: Try different character combinations to unlock hidden mixes and receive bonus effects!

games.title: Wednesday Addams Merge Drop Puzzle
games.description:
Wednesday Addams Merge Drop Puzzle – The Creepy & Addictive Wednesday Game Online!

Step into the spooky world of Wednesday Addams with Wednesday Ad Merge Drop Puzzle – the ultimate merge-and-drop puzzle challenge inspired by the viral fruit drop trend! Merge creepy items, unlock mysterious evolutions, and see what dark surprises await.

How to play? Drop and merge two identical spooky items to evolve them into bigger and scarier ones. Keep combining until you unlock the final giant mystery object – can you guess what Wednesday’s darkest creation will be?

Wednesday Ad Merge Drop Puzzle isn’t just fun – it’s creepy-cool and highly addictive. With gothic visuals, smooth animations, and the eerie vibe of Wednesday Addams’ world, it’s the perfect game for fans of puzzles, spooky aesthetics, and the Wednesday universe.

🔹 Free to play online – no download required
🔹 Works on any device (PC & mobile)
🔹 Creepy new items and evolutions coming soon
🔹 Perfect for quick plays or long spooky sessions

Start merging now and see if you can master the darkness in Wednesday Addams Merge Drop Puzzle
games.howToPlayText:
HOW TO PLAY:

SLIDE / SWIPE on the screen or with mouse and tap to throw funny Wednesday characters to merge them.

games.title: Squishy Sheep
games.description:
Your mission is to help an adorable cat friend collect every balloon in each level. All it takes is removing the right platform at just the right moment and letting physics do the magic.

Every level is carefully designed to be solved with just a few clicks, while the sheep bounces across ledges and gathers balloons in delightful, unexpected ways. With fluid animations and a cute, inviting art style, Squishy Sheep keeps you coming back for more until every level is complete.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap (on touchscreen) or click with the left mouse button to remove a platform / obstacle.
Timing is key remove platforms at just the right moment so physics does the rest.
The goal in each level is to help your sheep collect all the balloons by bouncing off ledges and using gravity.

games.title: World of Labubu. Life and Creativity
games.description:
«World of Labubu. Life and Creativity» is a colorful dress-up and interior design game for fans of creativity and fun. Create your own Labubu by choosing eyes, nose, mouth, colors, outfits, hats and accessories. Each character can be unique and reflect your personal style.

After customizing your hero, explore cozy houses on the map and decorate the interiors. Place furniture, hang paintings, add details and create rooms that match your vision. There are no strict rules here — only your imagination and freedom.

If you are a fan of Toca Boca or love creative games where you can dress up characters and design spaces, you’ll feel right at home in «World of Labubu. Life and Creativity». Experiment, express yourself and build your own stories!
games.howToPlayText:
In «World of Labubu. Life and Creativity» everything is simple:

1. Create your Labubu — choose eyes, nose, mouth, colors and style.

2. Pick outfits, hats and accessories to highlight your character’s look.

3. Enter the houses on the map and start interior decorating.

4. Arrange furniture, hang paintings, add details and make rooms cozy.

Controls: use your mouse to select and place items. Fans of creative games like Toca Boca will quickly feel at home — just experiment and create your own unique worlds!

games.title: Back To School: Uniforms Edition
games.description: Explore global fashion in Back to School: Uniforms Edition! This fun dress-up game lets you spin the wheel to unlock school uniforms from countries like Japan, the U.S., the U.K., India, France, and South Korea. Customize your character with stylish outfits, accessories, and hairstyles inspired by each culture. Dive into the diversity of school uniforms and become a fashion expert while having fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Explore global fashion in Back to School: Uniforms Edition! This fun dress-up game lets you spin the wheel to unlock school uniforms from countries like Japan, the U.S., the U.K., India, France, and South Korea. Customize your character with stylish outfits, accessories, and hairstyles inspired by each culture. Dive into the diversity of school uniforms and become a fashion expert while having fun!
Use your mouse to play the game on a desktop, tap to play on mobile devices.

games.title: Movie Star Daily Routine
games.description: Let's join the a day in the life of a movie star stream. We will spend the whole day with a famous actress from the series. The morning begins with cosmetic procedures and skin care. See how the skin of a movie star shines! Time to go in for sports to maintain excellent physical shape. Preparing for going to the gym begins with packing a bag - you need to take water, a yoga mat and other accessories. A star needs to look stylish even in the gym, so you need to get serious about choosing a tracksuit. It's time to put on your makeup and go to the screen test. The movie star will have to go through a casting and try on the image of the heroines of films and series. And finally, it's time to enjoy the glory. Having collected everything you need in a small clutch, the girl goes to the red carpet to amaze everyone with brilliant and original outfits!
games.howToPlayText: Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it. The result can be saved as a PNG image.

games.title: Match Story : Animals
games.description: Match Story Animals is a fun and addictive 3D puzzle game where players must match cute animal objects to clear the board. With smooth gameplay, colorful graphics, and hundreds of levels, it offers hours of entertainment for puzzle lovers. Use power-ups, boosters, and smart strategies to progress through challenging stages. Perfect for casual gamers of all ages!
games.howToPlayText:
🔍 Find and select three identical animal objects
🧩 Place them together to make a match
⚡ Use power-ups to clear tiles faster
⏱ Complete the level before time runs out
🏆 Progress through levels, earn rewards, and unlock new challenges

games.title: Maths Puzzle
games.description: Maths Puzzle is a fun and engaging logic-based game that challenges your mathematical skills and problem-solving abilities. With a variety of puzzles that range in difficulty, this game is perfect for anyone looking to improve their mental agility and enjoy a fun, educational experience. Your task is to solve mathematical equations by figuring out the missing numbers, symbols, or operations in order to make both sides of the equation equal. The puzzles come with increasing complexity, so you’ll need both strategy and quick thinking to succeed.
games.howToPlayText:
Objective: Your goal is to solve the math puzzle by filling in the missing numbers or operations to make the equation correct.

Start the Game: Click on the puzzle to begin. You’ll be presented with an equation that is missing some parts (numbers or operators).

Solve the Puzzle: Use your knowledge of basic arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division) to complete the puzzle. You may need to fill in missing numbers or choose the correct mathematical operators to balance both sides of the equation.

Hints: If you're stuck, some versions of the game offer hints that help guide you towards the solution. Use them wisely to avoid wasting moves.

Levels: As you progress, the difficulty will increase. New challenges such as more complex equations or multiple missing elements will keep you on your toes.

Time and Scoring: Depending on the version of the game, you may be timed, so solving the puzzles quickly could earn you more points or rewards.

Winning the Game: Successfully solve a series of puzzles to move to the next level. Keep going to challenge your brain and improve your math skills.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/maths-puzzle?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: World Flags Quiz
games.description: World Flags Quiz is a fast-paced, fun, and educational mobile game that challenges players to match countries with their correct flags. Designed with simplicity and clarity in mind, the game offers a single, highly addictive game mode that tests your geographical knowledge one country at a time. In each round, players are presented with the name of a country — such as France, Brazil, Japan, or Nigeria — and must choose the correct flag from a set of four options. Only one is right, and the other three are cleverly selected to test your attention to detail and flag recognition skills. Enjoy playing this flag quiz game here
games.howToPlayText: use mouse to choose any answer! World Flags Quiz is a fast-paced, fun, and educational mobile game that challenges players to match countries with their correct flags. Designed with simplicity and clarity in mind, the game offers a single, highly addictive game mode that tests your geographical knowledge one country at a time. In each round, players are presented with the name of a country — such as France, Brazil, Japan, or Nigeria — and must choose the correct flag from a set of four options. Only one is right, and the other three are cleverly selected to test your attention to detail and flag recognition skills. Enjoy playing this flag quiz game here

games.title: Sticker Art Book Puzzle
games.description:
Dive into the delightful world of Sticker Art Book Puzzle, where imagination meets puzzle-solving in a fun and engaging experience. This innovative app is the ultimate blend of adult coloring, art games, and brain-teasing challenges. This unique app offers a calming and colorful escape, combining the joy of coloring with the thrill of solving puzzles.

Say goodbye to traditional coloring books and hello to the Sticker Book Puzzle. Instead of using pencils, you'll fill intricate designs with vibrant stickers. It's a fresh take on adult coloring; every sticker is a stroke of creativity. Choose from a rich range of colors and match them with stickers to complete stunning artwork. Relax and unwind with Sticker Book Puzzle's calm gameplay.

Sticker Book Puzzle isn't just a coloring book; it's a brain teaser, too! Solve puzzles by strategically placing stickers to match the patterns and unlock the complete picture. Flex your mind and boost your IQ skills!
games.howToPlayText: Playing Sticker Art Book Puzzle is simple yet challenging in all the right ways. Using the provided numbers and shapes, your goal is to arrange the stickers in their corresponding positions to reveal the hidden stiker. With each passing color by number level, the sticker book puzzle become more complex and detailed, leaving you wanting more. Don’t forget to utilize the available hints and power-ups to help you solve the stiker puzzle and tackle more difficult coloring book puzzles.

games.title: Makeup Fruits
games.description: Have you ever imagined transforming a watermelon into a stunning masterpiece? At Makeup Fruits, you can creatively enhance fruits with cosmetics. Enjoy this fun game on your device and explore a vibrant world of fruity style, where each transformation allows you to express your flair.
games.howToPlayText:
Have you ever imagined giving a watermelon a makeover? How about adding a flutter of eyelashes or a swipe of lipstick to a juicy melon? In Makeup Fruits, your mission is to help these delightful fruits dazzle with beauty. It's all in your hands to adorn them with the perfect makeup and accessories for their stunning transformation!

Click to select the fruit you want to transform into a beauty icon, then proceed to choose and apply a variety of makeup options. Explore a diverse selection of brands, powder colors, eyelashes, lipsticks, stickers, and more!

At the end, you'll be able to take a "selfie" of your fabulous creation to share with your friends.

You'll also earn "gems" as a reward for your work. These gems can be used to unlock exciting new items and keep the fun going!

games.title: Escape from School 3D
games.description:
🏃‍♂️ Welcome to Escape from School 3D – the ultimate blox-style school escape game full of chaos, action, and fun! Trapped in a crazy high school, you must fight your way through evil teachers, bullies, principals, and headmasters to break free.

💥 Armed with anything you can find—baseball bats, bricks, slingshots, and more—it's up to you to survive the madness and make your daring escape!

🎮 Game Features:

• Action-packed school escape gameplay with hilarious chaos
• Dodge and fight angry teachers, bullies, and bosses
• Use funny and destructive weapons: bricks, bats, and more!
• Cartoony, blox-style graphics and smooth controls
• Explore multiple school zones: classrooms, hallways, gyms, and rooftops!
• Fast-paced and addictive gameplay with survival elements
• Easy to pick up, hard to put down – perfect for all ages!
games.howToPlayText:
On PC:
Use the WASD keys on keyboard to control the character, and the left mouse button for the weapon.

On mobile:
Use the virtual joystick to control the character.

Look for the elevator on the level to go through it. Collect money to buy new escape heroes.

games.title: Sneaker Factory!
games.description:
You're the owner of a sneaker factory! Will you be able to beat the competition and top the city ranking?

🔥 Fulfill orders – create sneakers on request: choose colors, apply labels and pack batches.

📦 Sorting in the warehouse – put the identical sneakers on the shelves.

🚚 Truck delivery – upgrade in driver mode: avoid obstacles and take the goods to the warehouse!

🏆 Leaderboard – Compete with other factories, earn a reputation and become No. 1!

Vivid graphics, dynamic gameplay and the excitement of production are waiting for you! Test your speed and business skills – start the game right now!
games.howToPlayText:
PC Management:

- By clicking on the buttons

During cargo delivery:
- Left Arrow - Brake/Reverse gear
- Right Arrow - Gas
- Space Bar - Jump

Management for Mobile devices:

- By clicking on the buttons

During cargo delivery:
- Left arrow button - Brake/Reverse
- Right arrow button - Gas
- Up arrow button - Jump

The level depends on the amount of reputation. Reputation can be earned by building improvements, sorting, order fulfillment, and shipping.

games.title: Jenny's Math Puzzle
games.description: "Jenny's Math Puzzle" is an engaging educational puzzle game that combines math challenges with interactive gameplay. Players must strategically place number tiles onto a grid to form correct mathematical equations. As a unique twist, the game seamlessly blends arithmetic practice with logical problem-solving, offering a fresh take on the genre. Its gradually increasing difficulty and visually appealing design make it both fun and mentally stimulating for players of all ages.
games.howToPlayText: The main objective is to complete all mathematical equations on the board by dragging number tiles from the pool to the empty slots. Each equation must be valid (e.g., horizontally or vertically correct). To win, fill the entire grid correctly without any mismatches. The primary control is using the mouse (or touch on mobile devices) to drag and drop tiles. If you make a mistake, you can remove tiles by dragging them back to the pool.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/jennys-math-puzzle?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Playful Cup
games.description:
The glass is sad because it's empty. Your job is to make the glass filled up with liquid and smile again!

Try to find the best way to complete each level. You can come up with your own solution so be creative and don't be afraid to think out of the box!

There are 3 game modes to play!
games.howToPlayText: Hold the screen to make the water flow into the glass. Take care to fill the glass without overflow!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/playful-cup?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Slides And Climbs
games.description: Slides And Climbs is a laid-back online game based on the traditional English board game of the same name, which served as an inspiration for the American version known as Chutes and Ladders. This beloved classic board game can be played for free in single-player mode or with friends locally. Roll the dice and navigate your way to the finish line. Let’s hope you avoid landing on a snake!
games.howToPlayText: You have the option to play with as many as six players, where each player can choose their own color. Roll the dice to advance your piece, and rolling a 6 gives you an additional free roll. You can enjoy Slides And Climbs with a maximum of six friends or choose to compete against AI opponents.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/slides-and-climbs?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Mole In The Hole
games.description:
Gameplay Overview

Dual Terrain Challenge: Navigate through layers of stone and sand, each requiring a specific tool for efficient digging.
Stone Blocks: Use the pickaxe to break through solid stone barriers.
Sand Blocks: Switch to the shovel to swiftly move through loose sand.
Treasure Troves: Keep an eye out for special blocks embedded with gold. Breaking these not only clears your path but also boosts your score.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard:
Movement: Use the arrow keys (Left, Right, Down) or (W, A, S) to guide the mole's direction.
Tool Switching: Press the Spacebar or 'Q' to toggle between the pickaxe and shovel.
Enter Shop: Press 'E' or click on shop icon to choose from shop upgrades


Roguelike gameplay
Buy upgrades to increase the value of sand and stone tiles that will affect your final score.
Choose from perks that affect gameplay and block value.

games.title: Balls Animal
games.description: Balls Animal is an addictive brain teaser where players sort colorful balls into matching tubes to solve challenging puzzles. With over 500 increasingly difficult levels, this cute puzzle game will keep you entertained for hours as you strategize the perfect moves to complete each level. The game features adorable animal characters that add charm to your puzzle-solving adventure, making the experience even more delightful. Perfect for puzzle lovers of all ages, Balls Animal combines simple mechanics with strategic thinking, making it easy to learn but satisfyingly challenging to master.
games.howToPlayText: Click on the bottle from which you want to take the ball, then click on the one where you want to place it.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/balls-animal?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Emoji Memory: Find a Pair
games.description:
You need to turn over the cards, trying to find pairs of identical ones.

If two different cards are turned over, they are automatically turned back over, giving the player a little time to memorize them.

The level will be completed when the player opens all pairs of cards in the playing field.

There are two additional game modes in which you can set records by competing with other players: for time and for the minimum number of moves.
games.howToPlayText:
Click on any inverted card with the mouse or your finger on the touchscreen to open it.

When a player has unfolded two cards, the player is credited with opening one pair of cards if they turn out to be the same. And if the cards turn out to be different, then they will turn back over.

After that, you can open the following cards.

games.title: Easter Rabbit Style
games.description: Celebrate the Easter season with style! Join adorable girls in a fun-filled egg hunt and dress-up adventure. Find hidden eggs, style cute spring outfits, and top off the look with playful accessories like bunny ears. Dive into the festive spirit with Easter Rabbit Style!
games.howToPlayText: Search for hidden Easter eggs, then dress up the girls in festive outfits with fun accessories like bunny ears to complete their perfect holiday look!

games.title: Mavy The Fish Mom
games.description: Mavy is a devoted fish mom who takes care of her children by cooking food for them. It's an Idle farming game.
games.howToPlayText: You are starting with basic equipment, then upgrading it later when you can afford the money, which can be collected from the fish. You can buy fish eggs to drop more valuable coins. After buying the egg, equip it, then lay it on the nest and wait for your little child to hatch
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/mavy-the-fish-mom?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Word Puzzle Connect Words and Letters
games.description:
Word Puzzle Connect Words and Letters  is a fun word game where you connect letter bubbles to form words on various themes. Improve vocabulary, brain training!

Word Puzzle Connect Words and Letters  is an engaging and addictive word game designed for players of all ages. Connect colorful letter bubbles to form words based on diverse themes, from nature to technology. Perfect for vocabulary building, brain training, and improving spelling skills, this game offers endless fun and challenges. 
Whether you’re looking to pass the time or boost your word knowledge, Word Puzzle provides an exciting experience with intuitive gameplay and progressively harder levels. Enjoy hours of word search, discover new words, and sharpen your mind. 
Play Word Puzzle Connect Words and Letters  anytime, anywhere — perfect for quick brain workouts or long relaxing sessions!
games.howToPlayText: Connect adjacent letter bubbles to form words matching the theme. Tap and drag over letters to create a word. Submit the word to earn points and clear the bubbles. Use hints if stuck. Complete levels by finding all theme words. Enjoy the challenge and improve your vocabulary!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/word-puzzle-connect-words-and-letters?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Candy for capybara
games.description:
Capybara Wants a Candy!
Match identical marmalades to create bigger candies and earn coins.
Use the crane to grab delicious treats for your capybara!

Game Features:
36 levels with increasing difficulty – from simple puzzles to challenging candy combinations.

Endless high-score mode – compete with friends for the best candy-matching skills.

Jelly physics – watch candies bounce, stick, and deform as they collide.

Adorable pet – the capybara reacts to your success (happy when fed, sad when you miss).
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play:
Marmalade Candy Control:
📱 Mobile:

Touch & drag to move candies – release to drop them.
🖥️ Desktop:

Mouse: Click & drag, release to throw.

Keyboard: Arrow keys (← → ↑ ↓) + Space to drop.

Crane Control:
📱 Mobile:

Slide your finger to move the crane – release to grab candy.
🖥️ Desktop:

Mouse: Move cursor + click to grab.

Keyboard: Arrow keys (← →) + Space to capture.

games.title: About a Frog
games.description: A puzzle game about a frog in which you need to pass various obstacles to activate the sail on a small raft to advance further.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop Controls:
↑ (Up Arrow) / W: Move upward.
↓ (Down Arrow) / S: Move downward.
← (Left Arrow) / A: Move left.
→ (Right Arrow) / D: Move right.
R: Restart.
Q: To Menu.
M: Mute.

Mobile Controls:
On-screen Buttons

*Gamepad supported

games.title: Kitten Never Dies
games.description: Join an interdimensional adventure to help a lost kitten find its way home! Solve unique challenges in each dimension. Cute, clever, and full of surprises—are you up for the challenge? Play now and test your puzzle-solving skills!
games.howToPlayText:
Embark on an interdimensional journey to aid the kitten in finding its way back home! Each dimension presents a unique challenge that you must overcome.

Think it's going to be a piece of cake? Oh, meow! Let's see if you've got what it takes!

Just tap a key, click with the mouse, tap the screen, or use your gamepad — the kitty will know what to do!  
If you want to play together on the same computer: 
Player 1 selects a button
While Player 2 chooses a different one.

games.title: Brain Coloring Puzzle
games.description:
Discover Italian Brainrot Meme Coloring Puzzle Game
Step into the viral world of Italian Brainrot Meme Characters, where over thirty absurd creatures await your palette. No numbers, no hints—only your eye for color and a playful spirit.
Meet the Stars
Bombardiro Crocodilo: Our most fiendish color‑match boss.
Tung Tung Tung Tung Sahur: A viral sensation inspired by Italian Brainrot.
Shimpanzinni Bananinni, Boneca Ambalabu, Tralalero Tralala and many more bring humor and challenge.
Why You’ll Love It
Brain‑Boosting Fun: Sharpens visual memory and logic.
Creative Freedom: No right answer—trust your instincts.
Offline Play: Dive in anytime, anywhere.
Designed for Ages 12+: Simple enough for kids, intriguing for teens and adults.
Ready to color outside the lines? Tap Install and unleash your inner artist on the most delightfully absurd paint‑puzzle around!
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play
Select Your Palette: Pick from 4–5 vibrant hues.
Tap to Color: Assign each color to outfit, shoes, hair and more—without numeric guidance.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/brain-coloring-puzzle?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Find The Dog
games.description: Get ready for some lighthearted fun! Explore whimsical black-and-white scenes filled with charming details and see how many cleverly hidden pups you can find. Each dog is playfully tucked away in different settings — from cozy parks to bustling streets — just waiting to be spotted. There's no rush, just relax and enjoy the search!
games.howToPlayText:
Get ready for some lighthearted fun! Explore whimsical black-and-white scenes filled with charming details and see how many cleverly hidden pups you can find. Each dog is playfully tucked away in different settings — from cozy parks to bustling streets — just waiting to be spotted. There's no rush, just relax and enjoy the search!

Controls:
🖱 Mouse: Move your cursor to explore the image.
🖱 Left Click: Click on a dog to find it.
🔍 Scroll Wheel: Zoom in and out to get a closer look.
🖱 Hold Left Click + Drag: Pan around the image.
💡 Hint Button (bottom left): Tap it to reveal the location of a hidden dog when you're stuck.

Have fun, and see if you can find them all!

games.title: Cooking Letters - Word Search
games.description:
- Start Your Culinary Adventure. When you enter the kitchen you will see a variety of tasty letters scattered across the game board. Each letter is an ingredient for creating words.  
- Find All the Hidden Words. Your goal is to find all the words from the list hidden on the game board. The faster you complete the task the more points you earn.  
- Unlock New Levels. As you progress you will unlock new levels where the words get longer and the challenges become more exciting. Cook up increasingly complex dishes made of letters.  
- Earn Rewards. For every word you find you earn points. Use them to unlock additional bonuses or new kitchen themes.  
- Train Your Brain. This game is not only fun but also helps improve focus vocabulary and quick thinking.
games.howToPlayText: - Collect Words. Swipe your finger or use your cursor to connect the letters and form words. You can connect letters in any direction horizontally vertically diagonally or even zigzag.

games.title: Mix Monsters: Fun Merge
games.description: Mix Monsters: Fun Merge is a captivating puzzle game that lets you combine quirky characters into unique creatures. Accessible on multiple platforms without the need for downloads or registration, it offers an enjoyable and creative experience suitable for all ages, perfect for quick entertainment and skill development.

games.title: Pop It 3D
games.description: Players take turns pressing down any number of bubbles in a single row and consecutively. The player who presses the last bubble loses the game.
games.howToPlayText: Click or tap on the cells you want to pop
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/pop-it-3d?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Super Frog Adventure
games.description: "Super Frog Adventure" is a great platformer that takes you into the world of classic Super Mario style games. The game features 8 incredible and challenging levels, each offering unique obstacles and challenges. Control the super frog, overcome obstacles, fight enemies and collect coins on your way to the finish line. Dynamic gameplay and vivid graphics will make your journey exciting and memorable. This game is designed for both beginners and experienced players, thanks to different difficulty levels and interesting gameplay mechanics. If you love classic platformers and are ready for a new adventure, "Super Frog Adventure" is waiting for you! Discover the amazing world of Super Frog and dive into an exciting platforming adventure!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop: Left/Right or A/D keyboard keys to move the character. Up arrow or W keyboard key to make the character jump.

Mobile: Use touch screen buttons.

Press jump button in the air to perform a double jump.

Collect all the fruits to pass the level!

games.title: Prásino
games.description:
Prásino is a small survival game set in a world drowned in trash. 
Your only lifeline is the trees - without them, there’s no air to breathe.

Plant magic seeds to grow trees, restore barren zones, and carve a path forward. 
But stay alert,  trash-born enemies lurk everywhere, ready to stop you.
games.howToPlayText:
Beware of enemies and collect magic seeds to plant trees. 
Manage your breath wisely, it’s your lifeline.

Desktop Controls:
↑ (Up Arrow): Move Up
↓ (Down Arrow): Move Down
← (Left Arrow): Move Left
→ (Right Arrow): Move Right
Z: Plant a Tree
X: Attack / Break Loot Boxes

Mobile Controls:
On-Screen Joystick: Drag to move in any direction
Plant Button: Tap to plant a tree
Attack Button: Tap to attack enemies or break loot boxes

games.title: Hide the Monster: Choose Pose
games.description: Hide the Monster: Choose Pose is a fun online puzzle game where you assist cute monsters in escaping danger. Enjoy challenging levels that test your logic under pressure, with escalating difficulty as you find the best positions for the monsters to remain hidden.
games.howToPlayText: Click to change the monster's pose, drag it to match the cover shape, and save it before time runs out!

games.title: DreamBlox
games.description: Join a multiplayer game where you can earn coins, buy accessories and cute pets, and train them in various tricks at a special school.
games.howToPlayText:
Collect coins and explore the world! Use your earned coins to purchase pets and various accessories in the shops.
Take your pets to a special school to teach them different tricks.
Explore all locations and discover new entertainment opportunities.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/dreamblox?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Match Master
games.description:
Get ready for a new, challenging and original matching pairs brain game.
You need to match 3D objects on the ground and pop them all! When you clear a level, you will find new objects to pair. Sort and find all pairs, clear the board and win!

Start searching for hidden object and matching tile pairs - Match 3D is a perfect way to zen relaxing and at the same time testing your memory and mind skills.
games.howToPlayText:
- Pick the 1st 3d object it can be (a shiny 3D object, animal, or an emoji)
- Then pick up the 2nd 3d object & move both of them to the circle in the middle of the screen.
- Keep doing that until you clear the whole screen & win the level.
- Then keep having fun & start a new level
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/match-master?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Cats Block Puzzle
games.description:
Just drag and drop cats onto the puzzle board and see if you can make them all fit perfectly! 🧩 Each puzzle has its own unique shape and gets more challenging as you play, which will make your brain think differently. With every puzzle you solve, it gets more challenging. Will you be able to fit all the kitties? 😼

As you master each puzzle, you can collect adorable new cats to personalize your gameplay!

PUZZLE CATS FEATURES:

  PLAY WITH CUTE CATS
- Enjoy a variety of adorable cats like cute cats, fat cats, and even some angry cats! 😺
- Try to fit all the cats in the puzzle without upsetting them!

FUN BLOCK PUZZLES
- Challenge yourself with engaging block puzzles, but now with cute cats instead of regular blocks! 🐾
- Arrange the blocks to fit the board and move to the next level!

COLLECT NEW CATS
- Solve puzzles and level up 🎉
- Collect new cats as you progress in levels!
- Dress up your cats with cute costumes!

TRAIN YOUR BRAIN
- Improve your thinking and spatial reasoning with these shape-based puzzles 🧠
- Puzzles become tougher as you advance, keeping the challenge fresh!
games.howToPlayText:
Just drag and drop cats onto the puzzle board and see if you can make them all fit perfectly! 
Each puzzle has its own unique shape and gets more challenging as you play, which will make your brain think differently. With every puzzle you solve, it gets more challenging. Will you be able to fit all the kitties? 😼

games.title: Emoji Math Quiz
games.description: Embark on a brain-teasing adventure with Emoji Math, the game that blends math puzzles with emoji fun! Challenge yourself through six equations where each emoji represents a numerical value. Sharpen your skills as you decipher the emoji codes to solve each equation correctly. Dive into Emoji Math and unravel the mystery behind every emoji's value to conquer this exciting mathematical journey!
games.howToPlayText: Click on empty form to input your answer. Use hint if you are stuck. Theme toggle option for dark mode and light mode support. View leaderboards and share your progress with your friends.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/emoji-math-quiz?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Fun Toy Pals
games.description: Step into a cozy playroom and explore a world full of charming toys! In this addictive merge game, your goal is to combine matching toys on the colorful carpet to create higher-level toys. Unlock achievements as you reach higher scores and compete with players around the world on the global leaderboard. Cute visuals, fun combinations, and endless merging challenges make this game perfect for casual gamers of all ages.
games.howToPlayText:
Combine toys of the same type by dragging them onto each other to create a new, higher-level toy. The more you merge, the higher your score! Complete achievements to unlock special rewards and climb the leaderboard to become the ultimate toy master.

Desktop Controls:
Mouse: Click and drag toys to merge them.

Mobile Controls:
Touch: Tap and drag toys to merge them.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/fun-toy-pals?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Foxy Eco Sort
games.description:
Join Foxy and Raccoon on their eco-mission! Sort waste, play match-3 and matching pairs to clean polluted locations. 

But it's not just cleaning! Uncover the conspiracy of cunning Ratty who wants to destroy the forest. Complete story chapters: track garbage trucks, expose arsonists and save your home!

Features:
🌿 Waste sorting - learn to separate waste: glass, plastic, paper and organics.
🌎 Clean up locations - each cleaned area becomes more beautiful, and the rescued animals rejoice!
🦝 Complete the story line by uncovering the cunning rat's conspiracies.
🦊 Funny characters - Foxy the fox will tell you why sorting is important, and the raccoon... well, he's still lazy, but he'll get it!
😂 Funny dialogues - the characters won't let you get bored, their communication will cheer you up!

Ready to save the planet? Then go ahead - Foxy and the raccoon are already waiting for you! ♻️🦝🦊

P.S. The game is made with love for nature and good jokes. Enjoy the game!
games.howToPlayText:
1. Sort Waste Correctly
Drag items to their matching categories: cardboard to cardboard, plastic to plastic, glass to glass, organic to organic.

2. Play "Match-3"
Combine three identical elements to clear the field.

3. Find Pairs
Flip cards and match eco-themed pairs. Train your memory and help clean the forest!

games.title: Millionaire Life
games.description: After a rough start, you've hit the jackpot, won the lottery and now go wild! Live out your wildest RICH dreams! Indulge in lavish spending, fulfill your biggest dreams, and embrace a life of over-the-top luxury with no regrets. Live the Millionaire Life! Start from humble beginnings and rise to the extravagant lifestyle of your dreams. Spend big on flashy cars, luxury mansions, and golden accessories as you show the world your fortune. In this fun and over-the-top casual game, your goal is simple: live lavishly, make bold choices, and embrace the most outrageous version of wealth imaginable. Unlock new items, upgrade your lifestyle, and become the ultimate symbol of success!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop Controls:

Mouse Click: Interact with buttons, menus, and purchase options.

Drag with Mouse: Move objects, unlock items, and complete tasks.

Mobile Controls:

Tap: Interact with items, buttons, and upgrade options.

Swipe/Drag: Collect, move, or place items to progress.
